name: Grid Run
summary:
Grid Run is an "old school" arcade - action style game. 
 
Rules are simple, Dodge grids, don't fall, don't get squeezed between incoming blocks! 
 
Challenging game physics. 
Show of your skills and match yourself with the best gamers out there! 
Challenging endless Jump and Run Game with limitless levels. 
Oh and a word on security, we are 100% secure! 
Tap screen to fly higher. 
 
Navigate with tapping your finger on the screen, and avoid incoming evil grids. Also avoid falling down or touching death zone behind you. 
 
Each evil grid block (blue color) has a critical flaw. There is a gap between them. You can run through that gap. Just tap your screen and you will jump. Grids move faster than you, but you can use their speed as an advantage. Timing is the key. You will be able to pass even two block with just one tap when you master the game. 
 
It is really fun and easy to play, but be warned, Grid Run is hard to master! 
 
Enjoy :)
